question: I was diagnosed with pre-type 1 diabetes in 2005.  I am a 27 year old female and am a little nervous about the progression of diabetes.  My fasting bg is normal and my highs are usually under 200.  But, each time I go to the doctor I have high levels of glucose in my urine.  I have been experiencing a lot of highs (for me its about 170 after meals) and lows (50-60 range) recently and was wondering if I was in the "honeymoon" phase and would soon be going on injectable or oral insulin.  Could my threshold for highs be lower than the "normal" range.  I'm only 5 foot and around 100lbs.  Does any of that even play into my highs/lows?  Any insight and advice would be greatly appreciated!
title: Do I need to go on insulin
